sect1.title: HDFSPipe.PipeOutAndMerge

para.emphasis: (ECL_RS, HadoopFileName, Layout, HadoopFileFormat, HDFSHost, HDFSPort, HDFSUser )

row.entry: The ECL recordset to stream out.
The fully qualified target HDFS file name.
The structure which describes the ECL_RS recordset.
The Hadoop data file format : FLAT | CSV
The Hadoop DFS host name or IP address.
HDFS username to use to login to HDFS in order to write the file

sect1.para: The HDFSPipe.PipeOutAndMerge macro writes the given ECL_RS recordset to the target HDFS system in file parts and merges them together to form a single target file on the HDFS system.
